about_the_game:
What is the iVRy Driver for SteamVR (Apple Vision Pro Premium Edition) DLC?


• It is the FULL version of the iVRy Driver for SteamVR with VisionOS support. This is equivalent to purchasing the "Premium" Edition in-app purchase in the Apple App Store. If you have purchased the "Premium" Edition via the Apple App Store, you should not purchase this DLC. This DLC CANNOT be used to upgrade the Mobile, PSVR, PicoVR or GearVR/Oculus versions.

What is iVRy?


• iVRy is an app for your Apple VisionOS Device, with a Virtual Reality headset driver for SteamVR.

What does that mean?


• Want to play PC VR* (Virtual Reality) titles without having to buy a dedicated VR headset?
• With iVRy and a compatible VisionOS headset you can!
• Supports Wired (USB) connections for greater visual quality and performance.
• Supports Wireless (Wifi) connections for greater mobility.
• Automatically adjusts quality to maintain optimal frame rates on all connection types.
• User configurable quality and performance options.
• Integrates with SteamVR, so no 'manager' / 'server' apps or additional configuration required.
• Includes SteamVR Dashboard overlay, to change driver settings in VR.
• Built-in support for popular motion controllers.
• Compatible with most HTC Vive and Oculus Rift** titles.
• Upgrade to "Premium" edition via Steam DLC or In-App Purchase to remove the limitations of the "Lite" edition.

* Valve OpenVR/SteamVR. Requires Valve Steam & SteamVR on Windows 7 or later.
** Oculus Rift titles require Valve SteamVR, Oculus Home & 3rd party 'LibreVR Revive' software.

Before you start

IMPORTANT:

When using the iVRy Driver for SteamVR for the first time, it MUST be started from the "Launch" button, to ensure any additional services and drivers it requires get installed.


Download the app

In order to use the iVRy Driver for SteamVR, you will need to download the 'iVRy' app from the Apple App store.
